title: Best of the Program | Guests: Ryan Kelley & Salena Zito | 6/10/22
description:
Reporter and columnist Salena Zito joins to discuss her article "Rhetoric vs. Realism" and the rising gas price crisis. Author and host of "YOUR WELCOME" Michael Malice joins to recap the week's news, including the murder attempt against Justice Kavanaugh. Ryan Kelley, Michigan gubernatorial candidate, was recently arrested on a Jan. 6 charge and he joins to tell his story.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
